Sentencas: This paper is devoted to a survey of the current technology and future market for utility-scale fuel cell plants.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: The phosphoric acid fuel cell (PAFC) is entering into the stage where it is practically available for use with natural gas.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Large capacity plants such as 11, 5 and I MW have been installed and operated in Italy and Japan.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants
The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: The molten carbonate fuel cell (MCFC) is in the demonstrating stage, both the fuel cell and the balance-of-plant (BOP) for natural gas.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Demonstration plants of 2 and 1 MW have been under construction in the USA and Japan.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Their efficiency will range from 40 to 50%.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is in the experimental stage around 100 kW for co-generation.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Its conceptual system design has been conducted for both centralized and dispersed power plant in a cooperation with Westinghouse and NEDO.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: A market survey is now considered on the basis that future fuel cells will run for around 40 000 h in a stable manner with competitive performance.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: The market for fuel cells will be roughly at 2000 MW in Japan by the year 2010.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Half of them will be installed for electric companies on the utility scale.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: The market will be shared between PAFC and MCFC by 10 and 90%, respectively.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Current technologies have not reached the stage to precisely forecast when fuel cells will be entering into the market on a utility scale.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: At the present time, it is worthwhile to consider how the technological and economic requirements will be definitely achieved.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: After achieving these requirements, fuel cells will be positively introduced and socially accepted as the best energy converting option to save energy and environmental impact.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants

Sentencas: Further efforts will be devoted to meeting the market from the technological and economic aspects.
Titulo: The market for utility-scale fuel cell plants
